card_name: Over the Face of the Waters
rules_text:
Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, choose target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn and return it to your hand. If you’ve reached godhood, put it onto the battlefield instead.
